articles.author: Wes Davis
articles.title: Apple to be fined over $500 million under EU antitrust law - The Verge
articles.description: Regulators in the EU are reportedly preparing to fine Apple over $500 million for anticompetitive behavior following a 5-year-old complaint about Apple Music from Spotify.
articles.content:
Apple to be fined over $500 million under EU antitrust law
Apple to be fined over $500 million under EU antitrust law
